titles.title: A bill to designate the Talkeetna Ranger Station in Talkeetna, Alaska, as the Walter Harper Talkeetna Ranger Station.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-578.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/29/2012--Introduced. Designates the Talkeetna Ranger Station that is located on B Street in Talkeetna, Alaska, and that is approximately 100 miles south of the entrance to Denali National Park, as the Walter Harper Talkeetna Ranger Station.
